articles.author: Edwin Chan
articles.title: Alibaba Leads Tech Slide After Pentagon Briefly Shows Blacklist - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. led a Chinese tech-share selloff after the Pentagon added some of the country’s biggest names to a list of companies aiding the military — only to withdraw that roster minutes later without explanation.
articles.content: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. led a Chinese tech-share selloff after the Pentagon added some of the countrys biggest names to a list of companies aiding the military only to withdraw that roster minutes… [+388 chars]

articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Japan's economy avoids technical recession, but fourth-quarter rebound misses expectations - CNBC
articles.description: Japan's economy grew 0.1% in the fourth quarter of 2025 compared to the previous three months, avoiding a technical recesssion
articles.content:
Japan's economy grew 0.1% in the fourth quarter of 2025 compared with the previous three months, narrowly avoiding a technical recession.
